name: Red gloves with golden decorations
data: It decreases the users strength unnoticably.
It decreases the users dexterity unnoticably.
It increases the users wisdom slightly.
It has little armour class for its type (almost non-existent in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration a tiny bit.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'channel power'.
